entry.title: Deerful - The Waves - 가사
entry.content:
A dream she set fire to the nests in the orchard
A dream that she cried watching them burn

She wishes a life that is different and new

She wishes to know the divine, the specific
She wishes a life that is distant and true

A dream that she went there with stones in her pockets
A dream she was gone by the break of the day

entry.title: Deerful - Some Nights - 가사
entry.content:

You were wasting time

if she saw that you were trying

Even minutes can feel like days

If there's nothing to say
Tell me stories of the good times
If you don't set a path
Then you can't lose the way
